author: Jordi Gil
title: Eurocopa 2024 | Jes√∫s Navas, el talism√°n de Espa√±a
text: Jes√∫s Navas, el talism√°n de Espa√±a El jugador de 38 a√±os ha sido finalista en los cinco grandes torneos en los que ha participado defendiendo la camiseta de la selecci√≥n espa√±ola Jes√∫s Navas est√° a apenas unos meses de su retirada del mundo del f√∫tbol. En diciembre pondr√° fin a una trayectoria que puede tener un desenlace muy dulce en caso de conquistar la Eurocopa del 2024 en Alemania. Aparte de su futbol, Navas es un futbolista que ha sumado un plus de fortuna a la Roja ya que el combinado espa√±ol siempre ha llegado a una fase final de un torneo oficial cuando ha estado en sus filas. As√≠ ocurri√≥ de inicio en el Mundial de 2010. Despu√©s de decidirse a acudir a la selecci√≥n tras unas reticencias por cuestiones personales, Navas lleg√≥ y bes√≥ el santo. En Sud√°frica particip√≥ de la final en la jugada que acab√≥ en el gol de Iniesta con una arrancada desde la banda derecha en una √©poca en la que a√∫n actuaba de extremo. En 2012 tuvo continuidad en la Eurocopa. Tampoco sin ser titular, pero s√≠ con importancia. Su gol frente a Croacia (1-0) ayud√≥ a poner fin a minutos de agon√≠a con la clasificaci√≥n en juego y la victoria que llev√≥ al equipo a cuartos hasta jugar la final ante Italia. Un a√±o m√°s tarde, en 2013, formaba parte de la plantilla que disput√≥ la Copa Confederaciones en Brasil. Espa√±a alcanz√≥ la final, pero esta vez no hubo victoria. Un Neymar imperial aplast√≥ a una Espa√±a que llegaba muy cansada a Maracan√° (3-0) despu√©s de una semifinal muy disputada ante Italia que se decidi√≥ en los penaltis. Su siguiente final con Espa√±a ya fue en 2023 en la Final Four de la UEFA Nations League. De la Fuente recuper√≥ al futbolista y fue titular en la final frente a Croacia. El partido acab√≥ sin goles se decidi√≥ en los penalties, donde su sustituto, Dani Carvajal, marc√≥ la √∫ltima pena m√°xima con un lanzamiento de panenka. Su √∫ltimo servicio Navas ha tenido continuidad con De la Fuente hasta la presente Eurocopa. Su √∫ltimo servicio a Espa√±a fue probablemente intentar [anular a Mbapp√© en los cuartos de final](/deportes/2024/07/10/mbappe-sera-presentado-martes-16-nuevo-9-real-madrid-105458259.html) cubriendo la sanci√≥n de Carvajal. El de Los Palacios lo dio todo hasta que fue sustituido en la segunda mitad por sus problemas cr√≥nicos en la cadera. Es dif√≠cil que tenga minutos en la final porque acab√≥ muy tocado, pero ya nadie le quita estar a las puertas de otro t√≠tulo en Berl√≠n. Todo parece indiciar que dir√° adi√≥s a la selecci√≥n cuando acabe la Euro ya que en diciembre se retira del f√∫tbol en el Sevilla. Habr√° sido una carrera de √©xitos y trofeos para la que ya es una leyenda del f√∫tbol espa√±ol. author: By
title: Nice temperatures through the rest of this week
text:
SIOUX FALLS, S.D. (Dakota News Now) -- We have a Dense Fog Advisory in effect across parts of the region until 10 a.m. Make sure you‚Äôre using those low-beam lights this morning as you‚Äôre headed out the door! Watch out for some slick spots thanks to the fog, too.
Conditions will remain dry over the next several days with highs in the mid to upper 20s and low 30s, but we do see a slight chance for some light snow early Friday for southeastern portions of the viewing area. This doesn‚Äôt look to provide much of anything significant for travel impacts or for snow accumulations.
The next chance for some precipitation comes over the weekend. The chances for snow will still be minor and won‚Äôt look to pose too much of a travel threat. As we look ahead to the beginning of next week, there is a stronger storm system looking to impact the Midwest, but our southeastern area would be on the tail end of it as much of it will be having a greater impact southeast of our area.
Nonetheless, colder air is on the way back for much of next week as temperatures fall a few degrees below normal meaning our highs will be in the lower to mid 20s.
Copyright 2023 KSFY. All rights reserved.

text:

author: Divya Kishore
title: Tom Selleck spotted eating alone on 80th birthday amid obesity battle and career decline
text:
Tom Selleck spotted eating alone on 80th birthday amid obesity battle and career decline
THOUSAND OAKS, CALIFORNIA: Tom Selleck turned 80 on Wednesday, January 29, but instead of having a big bash for his milestone birthday, the ‚ÄòBlue Bloods‚Äô star was reportedly seen eating alone at a McDonald's drive-thru.
The veteran actor was spotted eating lunch in his truck in Thousand Oaks, California, RadarOnline.com reported, citing sources.
Tom Selleck's 80th birthday lunch for one at fast food drive-thru
‚Äî Pacific Sanctum‚ú®THE BLESSED üòá (@preueth)[https://t.co/K9hB3Osyh0][January 30, 2025]
The publication also said that his solo lunch date should not come as a shock as he previously revealed that he prefers not to make a big deal out of his birthday.
Tom Selleck Celebrates Milestone 80th Birthday With Trip to McDonald‚Äôs Drive-Thru -
‚Äî William Dyer (@wdyerz)
"The photos were captured on Tuesday, January 28, one day before the TV icon celebrated his big milestone. In one picture, Tom was seen holding a bag of food that was handed to him by the person‚Ä¶[pic.twitter.com/zjice0jeGU][January 31, 2025]
Tom Selleck said he‚Äôs ‚Äòstopped celebrating birthdays‚Äô
‚ÄúI‚Äôll probably have dinner with maybe my brother and my sister and (my wife) Jillie, just go out to dinner, kind of be quiet and not make a big deal of it," he mentioned.
The ‚ÄòFriends‚Äô actor also shared, "I'm trying not to count. I stopped celebrating birthdays a while back. I intend to keep working."
Though Selleck is still hopeful to continue doing work, he‚Äôs yet to receive an offer following the cancellation of his long-running CBS series ‚ÄòBlue Bloods‚Äô in 2023.
As per a tipster, he‚Äôs even begun asking for help from his industry friends, like Jennifer Aniston and Courteney Cox.
Tom Selleck's lonely 80th birthday lunch for one at fast food drive-thru
‚Äî Daily Mail Online (@MailOnline)[https://t.co/kawhyu5hQ1][pic.twitter.com/c40ZIygAL1][January 30, 2025]
Tom Selleck thinks Jennifer Aniston and Courteney Cox will help him get work
They noted, ‚ÄúHe's desperate for work and calling in every favor he can think of. People might not realize how close he is with the Friends cast from back when the Magnum, P.I. hunk famously played a love interest of Cox's character, Monica Geller.‚Äù
‚ÄúThey all loved him when he was on the show. He's hoping Jennifer and Courteney will lend him a hand,‚Äù the source added.
The source even went on to say that Selleck‚Äôs hopeful that his ‚ÄòFriends‚Äô co-stars ‚Äúcan set him up with a gig of his liking, and maybe Jen can even get him on The Morning Show. He would love that.‚Äù
Regarding his off time, the source stated that the ‚ÄòThree Men and a Baby‚Äô actor is not liking it.
‚ÄúHe's a workaholic, he can't retire. Tom has finally gotten it, loud and clear, that Blue Bloods is not coming back, so he's trying to get work proactively. He has lots of friends in Hollywood and he's tapping all his contacts.‚Äù they asserted.
Tom Selleck faces health risk due to increasing weight
Another thing which is concerning is Selleck‚Äôs increasing weight. The 6-foot-4 man reportedly weighs around 350 pounds.
A mole said, ‚ÄúIt's no secret Tom's been in questionable health, and he tells everyone how much he resents this early retirement that he never wanted. His thunderous weight gain must be putting terrible pressure on his joints.‚Äù
The Florida-based Dr Gabe Mirkin also shared his two cents over the ‚ÄòQuigley Down Under‚Äô star‚Äôs health.
‚ÄúThe odds are overwhelming that he is already diabetic, and every high rise in blood sugar after eating can damage every cell in his body,‚Äù Mirkin added.

author: Saleen Martin
title: 'May this keep you safe from harm': WWII era Bible returned to New York veteran's family
text:
NATION Lost Bible returned to slain USAAF airman from World War II Saleen Martin USA TODAY During World War II, a woman bought three brothers Bibles to protect their hearts and guide them as they set out for battle.
The Bible had a metal cover on the front with the inscription ‚ÄúMay this keep you safe from harm."
Two of the brothers made it home, while the other, Lt. Edsel J. McKnight of the United States Army Air Forces, was shot down off the coast of France.
His Bible was mailed to the family but was lost sometime after. This month, his family finally got it back.
Ava Coogan's family is from Albany, New York and they found the Bible in late December while going through their late matriarch‚Äôs belongings.
On Jan. 11, Coogan met Lt. McKnight‚Äôs sister-in-law and returned the Bible to her, allowing her to put it back in its rightful place, next to the ones his brothers brought back home from war.
‚ÄòI kept playing with it and flipping through the pages‚Äô Coogan‚Äôs uncle and mother found the Bible in a stack of books. Their mother, Rosanne Vartanian, died nearly 20 years ago but was a collector and loved garage sales.
‚ÄúIt‚Äôs just so random that my grandmother had the urge to pick that up,‚Äù she said. ‚ÄúShe bought random things. There was no rhyme or reason to it. It was with a stack of other books.‚Äù
Coogan decided to research the Bible and found out soldiers often took them to war. Some can be found in museums.
‚ÄúThe whole premise of it was that the metal cover on the front is like a hard shield,‚Äù Coogan told USA TODAY. ‚ÄúThey would put it in their coat pockets ‚Ä¶ like the front breast pocket ‚Ä¶ that cover would protect their heart from bullets.‚Äù
Lt. McKnight‚Äôs name was also written in the Bible, said Coogan, who was drawn to the Bible for some reason. She couldn‚Äôt put it down, she recalled.
‚ÄúI kept playing with it and flipping through the pages,‚Äù she said.
She noticed that the Bible‚Äôs front cover had a slice in it, almost like something was underneath it. She examined it more closely and found a piece of paper folded up inside. She asked her uncle for help, who carefully used a butter knife to get the slip of paper out.
Once they retrieved the piece of paper from under the Bible‚Äôs cover, they saw that it was a plea for the Bible‚Äôs safe return to an address not too far away.
Although there was no area code, there was a phone number listed, so the family added their own area code and called.
‚ÄúI was just hoping for the best,‚Äù Coogan said. ‚ÄúWe found out that number worked.‚Äù
A car wreck took her 3 kids. Now through surrogacy, she is a mom again to a baby boy. A Georgia family was about to lose insurance for teen's cancer battle. Then they got help. Pedaling kindness: Massachusetts Peloton group leaves servers $7,200 tip 'Feed somebody you don‚Äôt know': Philadelphia man inspires, heals through food Why strangers raised $450,000 to help a dependable Burger King worker buy his first home Lieutenant was shot down off the coast of France When Coogan called the number written in the note, she spoke to a woman named Fay, Lt. McKnight‚Äôs sister-in-law. They organized a meetup on Jan. 11 to return the Bible to the family, who is from Porter Corners, part of Saratoga County in eastern New York.
Lt. McKnight served in the U.S. Air Force‚Äôs 365th Fighter Group and 388th Fighter Squadron. He was flying in a Thunderbolt fighter aircraft in 1944 when he was shot down off the coast of France, online records show.
Fay told Coogan and her family that Lt. McKnight has two brothers. All three of the brothers served in WWII. Fay‚Äôs husband, Ray, said his Bible saved his life.
‚ÄúHe got shot during the war and it hit where the Bible was, covering his heart, and the bullet went into his arm instead,‚Äù Coogan said.
Once Lt. McKnight was killed, his belongings were shipped back home to the family. His sister-in-law had all three Bibles on a bookshelf on display. One day, the family was preparing to go to church. Her nephew borrowed the Bible, but knew it was so precious, the family decided to write a note with contact information in case it were ever lost.
‚ÄúHe didn't lose it,‚Äù Coogan said. ‚ÄúHe brought it back after church and I guess what happened is after someone passed in their family, they had an estate sale ‚Ä¶ and it just accidentally went out with a stack of books.‚Äù
It ended up in Coogan‚Äôs grandmother‚Äôs hands, she said. Returning the Bible to the McKnight family was quite the enlightening experience, Coogan said.
‚ÄúThat was really cool because that's when we kind of got to hear their story,‚Äù she said.

15.ago.2024 √†s 18h30 Ouvir o texto Diminuir fonte Aumentar fonte Henrique Artuni S√£o Paulo
A introdu√ß√£o de "Fam√≠lia" pode enganar o espectador desavisado. Koji Yakusho , um dos principais atores do cinema japon√™s, vive um personagem que lembra a placidez do faxineiro de "Dias Perfeitos", indicado no √∫ltimo Oscar . Dessa vez, ele √© um ceramista, dedicado a estilo bastante tradicional desse of√≠cio. √â o pr√≥prio artes√£o, silencioso e dedicado, quem vai atr√°s da mat√©ria-prima e faz a queima em sua oficina, nos arredores da cidade de Toyota.
Mas os primeiros di√°logos do filme, bem como a cartela do t√≠tulo, s√£o em portugu√™s, entre os "bom dia" de uma massa de brasileiros, numa tomada a√©rea que circula pelo Homi Danchi, um conjunto habitacional do lugar, onde hoje, estima-se, moram mais de 5.000 imigrantes do nosso pa√≠s.
Koji Yakusho em cena do filme 'Fam√≠lia', de Izuru Narushima - Divulga√ß√£o Desde o princ√≠pio h√° uma oposi√ß√£o entre Seiji, o sujeito introspectivo que Yakusho interpreta com seriedade, e essa popula√ß√£o latina, que inclui tamb√©m gente de outros pa√≠ses da Am√©rica do Sul, m√£o de obra para a ind√∫stria de autope√ßas local.
Esses caminhos v√£o se cruzar pelo acaso, carregado entre tintas de melodrama, crime, sangue e xenofobia, pelas m√£os de Izuru Narushima , que dirige a partir do roteiro de Kiyotaka Inagaki. Apesar de alguns exageros, o cineasta, com quase 30 anos de carreira, estreia nos cinemas brasileiros com as garantias de ter traduzido uma realidade.
Veja cenas de 'Fam√≠lia', que retrata imigrantes brasileiros no Jap√£o ic_save

"O roteiro √© inspirado nas mem√≥rias do Inagaki e partir do contato com os atores brasileiros antes das filmagens, ouvindo suas hist√≥rias, alegiras e ang√∫stias do dia a dia", diz Narushima. "Cresci em T√≥quio e convivi com discursos xenof√≥bicos contra os coreanos . Dessa vez, fiquei tocado pela persist√™ncia desses problemas, mesmo 30 anos depois, em rela√ß√£o aos brasileiros."
O piv√¥ do enredo √© Marcos ‚Äîvivido pelo brasileiro Lucas Sagae‚Äî, que se mete com a Yakuza, a m√°fia japonesa , durante uma briga numa boate, tentando defender um amigo que deve aos bandidos.
Na fuga, Marcos acaba no quintal de Seiji ‚Äîpor acaso, no mesmo dia em que seu filho volta da Arg√©lia com a noiva, uma refugiada do pa√≠s, com planos de se fixar no Jap√£o e assumir o meti√™ do pai.
O n√∫cleo japon√™s, em tudo emp√°tico ao drama do imigrante, cuida do rapaz e, arisco, ele foge noite adentro ap√≥s receber os cuidados. Mas o calor brasileiro, mesmo em terra estranha, n√£o arrefece, e os colegas e a namorada de Marcos tentam, logo depois, estreitar os la√ßos com Seiji como agradecimento.
Maratonar Um guia com dicas de filmes e s√©ries para assistir no streaming
Carregando...
Por√©m, enquanto de dia a vida corre feliz ‚Äîentre as coxinhas, churrasco e samba que os brasileiros armam no p√°tio do conjunto habitacional‚Äî, Marcos √© obrigado a ter uma vida dupla como traficante, junto de outros brasileiros, para livrarem a pele do amigo na mira da Yakuza.
Naturalmente, os meandros do crime e do preconceito contra os estrangeiros v√£o conduzir o roteiro para uma espiral alucinante, que culmina numa sequ√™ncia de viol√™ncia e humaniza√ß√£o de um chefe da m√°fia, enquanto o filme equilibra outro n√∫cleo dram√°tico, com uma invas√£o terrorista no norte da √Åfrica.
Enquanto o filme se desdobra em diferentes abordagens ao longo de suas duas horas, a moral recai nos costumes de Seiji, sua paci√™ncia e resili√™ncia, mesmo diante de eventos tr√°gicos. " Uma das ideias do filme era aproximar os japoneses e os estrangeiros que moram no Jap√£o, para terem uma rela√ß√£o pr√≥xima, como uma fam√≠lia", diz o diretor.
A quest√£o da imigra√ß√£o √© reincidente na carreira de Yakusho, hoje com 68 anos, e espelha um dos seus primeiros trabalhos no cinema, quando interpretou um imigrante japon√™s no Brasil que se embrenhava pela Amaz√¥nia.
Agora, como artes√£o de pe√ßas belas e fr√°geis, seu personagem traduz novos significados para essas rela√ß√µes. "O aspecto primitivo, a rela√ß√£o com a chama, a terra e a √°gua necess√°ria para produzir a cer√¢mica foram os principais motivo da escolha do roteiro. Na cena final, Marcos se firma como um disc√≠pulo desse caminho", afirma o diretor.
"Fam√≠lia" √© distribu√≠do no pa√≠s pela Sato Company, numa aposta mais arriscada que a dos √∫ltimos longas que trouxe, como "O Menino e a Gar√ßa" e "Godzilla Minus One", sucessos de bilheteria l√° fora.

author: @Metropoles
title: Ap√≥s bifurcar l√≠ngua, Andressa Urach planeja colocar um terceiro seio | Metr√≥poles
text: Ap√≥s bifurcar l√≠ngua, Andressa Urach planeja colocar um terceiro seio A modelo de conte√∫do adulto intrigou os seguidores ao sugerir a possibilidade de implantar mais um seio atualizado Compartilhar not√≠cia [Andressa Urach](https://www.instagram.com/andressaurachoficial/?hl=pt-br) usou as redes sociais para conversar com os seguidores e falar sobre as mudan√ßas que tem feito em seu corpo. A modelo, que recentemente bifurcou a l√≠ngua, levantou a possibilidade de implantar um terceiro seio. Ela pediu a opini√£o dos f√£s para saber se realiza ou n√£o a interven√ß√£o. ‚ÄúGente, ser√° que ficaria legal um terceiro seio? O que voc√™s acham? Fa√ßo essa essa transforma√ß√£o ousada?‚Äù, legendou a modelo. A ideia de Andressa n√£o √© t√£o original quanto parece. Em 2013, a massagista americana Jasmine Tridevil, de 21 anos, ficou famosa ao afirmar ter implantado um terceiro seio e um mamilo extra tamb√©m. Ela dizia ter desembolsado US$ 20 mil (aproximadamente R$ 47.200 mil) na √©poca. No entanto, meses depois, a pol√≠cia descobriu que a pr√≥tese que a mo√ßa exibia na internet era falsa. Saiba quanto Andressa Urach gastou com novas tatuagens [Andressa Urach](https://www.instagram.com/andressaurachoficial/?hl=pt-br) costuma mostrar as mudan√ßas em sua vida pelas redes sociais. Al√©m de cirurgias pl√°sticas, como a [bifurca√ß√£o na l√≠ngua](https://www.metropoles.com/celebridades/andressa-urach-faz-nova-mudanca-no-corpo-e-comemora-livre-com-jesus), a [criadora de conte√∫do adulto](https://www.metropoles.com/celebridades/saiba-o-que-aconteceu-com-andressa-urach-durante-cena-de-sexo) cobriu grande parte de seu corpo com tatuagens. Durante intera√ß√£o com os seguidores, ela declarou que gastou mais de R$ 100 mil nos desenhos. ‚ÄúAs cicatrizes sempre me incomodaram, e eu sabia que precisava de algo mais eficaz para lidar com elas‚Äù, disse, ao contar que fez tatuagens 3D para cobrir cicatrizes causadas pelo PMMA em suas pernas. Ela contou que est√° ‚Äúextremamente satisfeita‚Äù com o resultado e que tomou a decis√£o certa. ‚ÄúAgora, posso olhar para as minhas pernas sem ser constantemente lembrada do que passei‚Äù, disse. Por fim, ela revelou se pretende fazer mais tatuagens. Ainda cogito cobrir meu corpo com mais tatuagens. Al√©m de esconder as marcas, elas me fazem sentir ainda mais bela‚Äù, completou.

author: Ground News
title: Ground News - Armenian clergy members attacked in Jerusalem over real estate dispute
text:
Summary by Ground News The attack took place near the Mizmoriya checkpoint, on the southern side of eastern Jerusalem . One terrorist, who arrived at the checkpoint armed with a knife, stabbed the two victims before being neutralized by security personnel at the scene. Both of the victims were conscious at the time, according to MDA. The terrorist was critically wounded and died of his injuries shortly thereafter. Share menu More

author: hindi.sportskeeda.com
title: What happened to Kanye West‚Äôs $1.5M church building? Property now abandoned with a lot of trash
text:
') > -1) { addClass($('.section-container'), 'pill-tag'); } Rapper Kanye West (Photo by Ronald Martinez/Getty Images) Like what you are reading? Unlock the Full Story for Free! Sign in with Google Continue with Facebook Login using other methods Rapper Kanye West purchased a $1.5 million property in March this year to move his Christian School, Donda Academy. However, reports reveal that the building is abandoned and surrounded by trash.
This piece of news has become the center of attention as it now sits completely abandoned, marred by neglect, and littered with trash.
Expand Tweet The famous rapper and fashion magnate, known for his high-profile projects and artistic activities, purchased the property to create a spiritual refuge. However, recent photographs and stories reveal a significant departure from this initial idea, prompting concerns about the fate of the once-prominent church building.
Kanye West is a multifaceted musician and entrepreneur who is no stranger to the spotlight, but the recent status of his church property has drawn a new kind of attention. The site, which was once supposed to be a place of prayer and community participation, now stands desolate. Its doors are now closed, and the surroundings are likely the result of neglect.
Kanye West's church now stands abandoned West's million-dollar church stands abandoned (Images via Instagram/@jesusisking) West purchased this $1.5 million property building with the intention of creating a location where people might come together for spiritual reflection and other communal activities. The musician is well-known for investigating faith and spirituality in his music. He appeared sincere in his desire to create a positive environment through this venture.
The property appears neglected, with overgrown foliage, damaged windows, and trash mingling with the once-pristine surroundings. The sharp contrast between the original design and the current state of the church building has piqued the interest and concern of both devotees and the general public.
The reasons behind the apparent abandonment of the property remain unclear. Speculations range from financial challenges to shifting priorities in Kanye West's busy and dynamic career. While West has yet to comment on the issue publicly, there have been numerous circulating online discussions talking about the responsibilities that come with high-profile investments.
The online response to the news has been swift, with social media buzzing about the fate of Kanye West's $1.5 million church. Fans and critics alike are sharing their opinions on the situation, questioning the rapper's intentions and expressing disappointment at the state of the abandoned property.
Expand Tweet This development also raises broader questions about celebrities and their responsibilities regarding real estate investments. High-profile figures like Kanye West often have the means to acquire luxury properties. However, the public increasingly holds them accountable for the maintenance and purposeful use of such assets.
As the story unfolds, the fate of Kanye West's $1.5 million church building remains uncertain. Will it be rejuvenated and fulfill its intended purpose, or will it continue to be a symbol of unrealized potential? Only time will tell, but for now, the abandoned property is a poignant reminder of the challenges and scrutiny that accompany fame and fortune, even in real estate.
Edited by Ivanna Lalsangzuali
